org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.infrastructure

Interface Bandwidth

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BackgroundBandwidth, SimpleBandwidth

    public interface Bandwidth
    A Bandwidth represents a network link between two adjacent GridSites. Methods such as adding and dropping connections and querying the current and maximum bandwidth must be implemented.

    Copyright (c) 2004 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html

    Since:
    JDK1.4

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addConnection()
      Add an extra connection to this network segment
      float availableBandwidth()
      Find out what network connection would be available on this network segment for a potential file transfer.
      int connectionCount()
      Enquire the number of connections for this network segment
      float currentBandwidth()
      Returns the bandwidth available at the moment for file transfers currently ongoing on this link.
      void dropConnection()
      Remove a connection on this network segment
      float maxBandwidth()
      Return the maximum available bandwidth for this network segment

    • Method Detail

      • addConnection

        void addConnection()
        Add an extra connection to this network segment

      • dropConnection

        void dropConnection()
        Remove a connection on this network segment

      • availableBandwidth

        float availableBandwidth()
        Find out what network connection would be available on this network segment for a potential file transfer.
        Returns:
        The bandwidth that would be available for a file transfer.

      • currentBandwidth

        float currentBandwidth()
        Returns the bandwidth available at the moment for file transfers currently ongoing on this link.
        Returns:
        The bandwidth available for current file transfers.

      • maxBandwidth

        float maxBandwidth()
        Return the maximum available bandwidth for this network segment
        Returns:
        Bandwidth available if only one connection is utilising this link

      • connectionCount

        int connectionCount()
        Enquire the number of connections for this network segment
        Returns:
        Number of concurrent connections for this network segment
